name: Fantasy Grounds
description: Can be upgraded to paying version during or after installation.
notes:
Simply press OK to every prompt.
The installer may restart a few times during installation without a problem.
At the end of installation the following error will popup: "Unable to create Start Menu Shortcuts; CoInitialize Error: 1" simply click on "OK".

If you have problems with fullscreen not working, activate "windowed (virtual Desktop)" in the Runner Option.
content:
files:
- setup: https://fantasygrounds.com/filelibrary/FGWebInstall.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Fantasy Grounds/FantasyGrounds.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  esync: true
